did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: The collection contains information on the Tanner and Bradley families, though it is unclear whether the materials are related. Tanner material is comprised of a photostat of a genealogy of William Tanner, Sr., of South Kingston, Rhode Island and his descendents by Rev. George C. Tanner, Faribault, Minnesota with name index. Stamped with Genealogical Society of Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints. There is also a photocopy of a handwritten Bradbury ancestry chart compiled by Carl F. Hinderer, March 1981. (The Bradburys and Tanners appear to be related.) Bradley family materials include two binders containing photostats of Bradley genealogical research, including data sheets and typed notes - affiliated families include Streeper, Bane, Caine, Copland, Cope, and Hannum, and the families are mainly from the Midwest, Philadelphia and West Chester, Pennsylvania. Most sources are cited. A third binder contains a photostat of a Bradley Family Genealogy compiled over many years by R. Maude Bradley, which includes ancestor charts, narrative, and datasheets.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
